text: The Four Nations Tournament () was an association football tournament organized in China by the Chinese Football Association and International Sport and Leisure (ISL).今夏再搞四国赛拟请克罗地亚队 The Championship was founded in 2000 as a single-elimination tournament with four national teams. However, it was abolished in 2001 due to the bankruptcy of ISL.国家队赞助商ISL突告破产 国足遭遇釜底抽薪 ==Tournaments== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 100%; text-align: center; width: 60%;" |- ! width=5% | Year ! width=10% | Host ! width=15% | Winner ! width=15% | Runners-Up ! width=15% | Third Place ! width=15% | Fourth Place |- | January 2000 Details | Guangzhou | | | | |- | September 2000 Details | Shanghai | | | | |- | 2001 Details | Shanghai | | | | |- |} ==See also== * Arabian Gulf Cup * Bangabandhu Cup * China Cup * Indonesian Independence Cup * King's Cup * Kirin Cup * Korea Cup * LG Cup (association football) * Lunar New Year Cup * Merdeka Tournament * Merlion Cup * Nehru Cup * Pestabola Merdeka * VFF Cup ==References== Category:Football cup competitions in China Category:Chinese football friendly trophies
title: Four Nations Tournament (China)
